## Anticipated deliverable(s)

By the end of today's class, you should have: 

- a blog listing page as a new navbar tab on your Quarto website
- the skeleton of your first blog post

## Pre-class Prep

Please be sure to complete the following before class:

- [**Consider which listing type you'd like to use.**]{.teal-text} A blog listing page is a web page that displays all of a blog's posts. Quarto provides [three built-in listing page types / styles](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-listings.html#listing-types) to choose from. Check out the previews and identify which you might want to use.
